description: SharePoint is a Microsoft platform for document management and intranets, enabling teams to collaborate, store, and organize content securely and effectively

capabilities.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Creates a new folder in SharePoint using the REST API.

capabilities.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_LIST
capabilities.description: Creates a new list in SharePoint using the REST API.

capabilities.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_LIST_ITEM
capabilities.description: Creates a new item in a SharePoint list.

capabilities.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_USER
capabilities.description: Creates a new user in SharePoint.

capabilities.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_FIND_USER
capabilities.description: Finds a user in both Microsoft Graph and SharePoint to verify their existence and status.

capabilities.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_REMOVE_USER
capabilities.description: Removes a user from SharePoint. Will not fail if user doesn't exist.
